titles.title: A resolution encouraging United States air carriers in international service to implement the United States Committee for UNICEF's Change for Good program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

bill.summary: 12/2/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that U.S. air carriers in international service should be encouraged to implement the U.S. Committee for UNICEF's Change for Good program (which collects foreign coins) for the benefit of the world's neediest children.
